content: 5 double_crochet 6 around on your current round 7 double_crochet 6 increase repeat 16 using the long tail from the body stitch position the legs low on each side of the body stitch around the wider thigh of the leg and let the narrow part hang loose working toe 3rd toe double_crochet 6 directly onto round 8 decrease double_crochet 7 increase double_crochet 6 16 the head onto the body as on page 34 the 2nd toe connecting the two toes see round 9 double_crochet 7 increase repeat 18 use pins to help position the head pictures a and b page 34 double_crochet 12 onto the round 10 double_crochet 5 increase repeat 21 attach a long piece of yarn to the legs remaining toe connecting it to the other round 11 double_crochet 6 increase double_crochet 6 increase double_crochet 5 decrease 22 position the legs to the sides of the two toes see picture c double_crochet 6 back onto round 12 decrease double_crochet 7 increase double_crochet 4 increase double_crochet 7 23 dinosaur they should lie low on the the 2nd toe double_crochet 6 back onto the 3rd toe round 13 double_crochet 11 increase double_crochet 11 24 body so that the narrow part of the legs you should now have one whole piece round 14 double_crochet 7 increase repeat 27 hangs slightly below the body using consisting of 36 stitches around see round 15 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 12 increase double_crochet 11 27 the yarn you just attached stitch picture d 36 round 16 double_crochet 10 increase double_crochet 6 increase double_crochet 9 29 around the wider thigh of the leg round 6 double_crochet 5 decrease double_crochet 4 decrease double_crochet 10 decrease double_crochet round 17 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 8 increase double_crochet 9 increase double_crochet 7 securing it to the body you may need 4 decrease double_crochet 5 32 30 to squish this part of the leg flat against round 7 double_crochet around 32 round 18 double_crochet 9 increase repeat 33 the body as you stitch see photos round 8 double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 14 decrease double_crochet 7 30 round 19 double_crochet 6 increase double_crochet 4 increase repeat 4 times above right round 9-10 double_crochet around 2 rnds double_crochet 6 38 using the long tail hanging from the round 11 double_crochet 7 decrease double_crochet 13 decrease double_crochet 6 28 slip_stitch to join tie off with a long tail narrow part of the leg attach the foot top up the stuffing if needed round 12 double_crochet 6 decrease double_crochet 12 decrease double_crochet 6 26 to the leg be sure to keep the leg and arms round 13 double_crochet 5 decrease double_crochet 11 decrease double_crochet 6 24 foot centered use pins if needed round 14 double_crochet 2 decrease repeat 18 make two using color a stuff the tail and position it on the round 15 double_crochet around 18 round 1 chain 2 6 double_crochet in second chain from hook lower back of your dinosaur it will be stuff firmly round 2 double_crochet 2 increase repeat 8 hard for
